reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great inexpensive little nightstand!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this nightstand because it looked nice, is small, but mostly because it was inexpensive. It’s easy to put together, takes maybe 30-45 minutes, all tools are included (allen wrench & a screwdriver). It is not big, note its measurements, don’t go by the picture.The top of the nightstand has two three-prong outlets and two rectangular USB-A power ports. Made of nice looking laminate boards and black steel framework. The drawers are one piece, made of thick canvas fabric and come folded. Once assembled they function well, no rollers or tracks, and this greatly adds to its speedy assembly and low price.This is a nice nightstand, suitable for a small bedroom, but not as, say, a wedding present.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy & nice looking
reviews.reviewText: It is a nice sturdy end table. Had easy to follow instructions on how to put it together. Screws for the handles good be a little longer , will have to see if it creates problems. But I think it is worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Right size right fit
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for small space. Easy to assemble too. Great color and matches my furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I think these are worth the price. I didn’t read the description well enough and was a little surprised by the drawers being flexible bins (not that they’ll get used much). That being said, the usb and electric outlets on top are great. We're using them in our guest room and love the size (small room with a queen bed). They are sturdy and look good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is great if you need a cheeper night stand!
reviews.reviewText: I got this night stand because my bed unexpectedly just broke and unfortunately it had my head board attached to it, but i ordered this on a thursday and it arrived on saturday. it was really easy to build and it came with all of the tools needed to build it. the drawers have a great amount of depth and space to them, it’s everything i wanted and needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price point !
reviews.reviewText: Very practical, sturdy as described for the price point. It’s very functional serves its purpose, and it is not heavy duty by any means, but it could definitely hold plenty of clothes. You could stuff it full and it can handle it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy stand
reviews.reviewText: This nightstand is being used for my foyer and I have one for my printer in my office. Is easy to assemble and easy instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and perfect
reviews.reviewText: Needed a new table for my mom’s apartment at assisted living. She loves it.
